name: Color Dance [2021]
description: ‘COLOR DANCE’ IS AN ORIGINAL, SINGLE EDITION VIDEO WORK BY LUKE CONROY. A dance of abstract color controlled by the movement of ballet dancers. The original collector of this NFT will unlock a personal link to download an exclusive high definition, extended version of this work (coordinate by contacting artist directly @lukefconroy) // NFT details: MP4, 1920x1080 px, 30 seconds, single edition // Original collector exclusive download: MP4, 3840 x 2160 px, 3:00 minutes.
